lyrics.text: Lesson 32. Shopping made easy. First listen and then answer the question. Who was the
lyrics.translation: 第32课。购物变得简单。首先听，然后回答问题。是谁

lyrics.text: thief? People are not so honest as they once were. The temptation to steal is greater than
lyrics.translation: 小偷？人们不再像以前那样诚实了。偷窃的诱惑比以往任何时候都要大。

lyrics.text: ever before, especially in large shops. A detective recently watched a well-dressed
lyrics.translation: 以前从未有过，特别是在大型商店里。最近，一名侦探观察到一个衣着考究的人

lyrics.text: woman who always went into a large store on Monday mornings. One Monday there were fewer
lyrics.translation: 一个总是在周一上午去大商店的女人。有一个周一，人少了

lyrics.text: people in the shop than usual when the woman came in, so it was easier for the detective
lyrics.translation: 当那个女人进来时，店里的人比往常多，所以对侦探来说更容易

lyrics.text: to watch her. The woman first bought a few small articles. After a little time, she chose
lyrics.translation: 看着她。那位女士首先买了几件小商品。过了一会儿，她选择了

lyrics.text: one of the most expensive dresses in the shop and handed it to an assistant who wrapped
lyrics.translation: 商店里最贵的裙子之一，递给了一个店员，店员把它包起来

lyrics.text: it up for her as quickly as possible. Then the woman simply took the parcel and walked
lyrics.translation: 尽快为她准备好。然后那个女人简单地拿了包裹就走了。

lyrics.text: out of the shop without paying. When she was arrested, the detective found out that
lyrics.translation: 没付钱就离开了商店。当她被捕时，侦探发现

lyrics.text: the shop assistant was her daughter. The girl gave her mother a free dress once a week.
lyrics.translation: 店员是她的女儿。那个女孩每周给她的母亲一件免费的衣服。
